hadiths.text: ‘Abd Allah (b. Masud) said:When any of you bows, he should spread his arms on his thighs and clap both his palms (Placing them between the knees), as if I am seeing the variation of the fingers of the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ)

chapter.eng-name: Placing The Hands On The Knees (During Ruku')
